long_description: Designed to keep you comfortable on hot runs in the sunshine with its performance fabric and UPF 50+ rating, the ASICS Favorite T-shirt also resists odors to ward off post-run stinkiness. Soft, lightweight fabric provides dries quickly and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable when you start to sweat. Mesh construction increases cooling ventilation; antimicrobial treatment resists odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Flat seams reduce chafing; reflective logo. The semifitted ASICS Favorite T-shirt is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: Designed to keep you comfortable on hot runs in the sunshine with its performance fabric and UPF 50+ rating, the ASICS Favorite T-shirt also resists odors to ward off post-run stinkiness.
